common.cantCancel: We were unable to cancel your order.
common.cancelationInstructions: If you would like to continue with the cancellation, you can refuse delivery and your payment will be refunded later.

outro.text01: Îți stăm cu drag la dispoziție! Dacă dorești să ne contactezi, te rugăm să ne suni la
outro.text02: sau să ne scrii un email la adresa
outro.text03: . Reține că nu poți răspunde la acest email, deoarece aceasta este adresa automată.

access.title: Codul tău de acces
access.text01: Trebuie să îți confirmăm identitatea pentru a-ți permite accesul la pagina pe care încerci să o vizualizezi.
access.text02: Te rugăm să revii la pagina de autentificare și să utilizezi codul de mai jos pentru a te conecta:

order.title: Mulțumim pentru comanda ta nr.
order.detailsTitle: Iată și detaliile despre comanda ta
order.introMessage01: Ne bucurăm că te avem alături de noi și îți confirmăm că am primit comanda ta cu numărul
order.introMessage02: . Acum e rândul nostru :). Vom începe de îndată să verificăm comanda și disponibilitatea produselor pe care dorești să le achiziționezi, astfel încât tu să te ocupi în liniște de restul planurilor tale. Revenim cu vești, prin email și sms.
order.introMessageReplaced: We are waiting for possible payment approvals to proceed with your order.
order.track: track this order on our site

payment.title: Payment
payment.bankInvoiceReminder: Do not forget to pay your bank bill if you have not already done so.
payment.preparingShippingOneProduct: We are providing the invoice for your order and shipping your product.
payment.preparingShippingManyProducts: We are providing the invoice for your order and shipping your products.

invoice.manyInvoices: Your order has more than one invoice.
invoice.notifications: We will let you know about the progress of each of them.
invoice.handlingProduct: We are packaging your product to arrange shipping.
invoice.handlingProducts: We are packaging your products to arrange shipment.
invoice.handlingProductPickup: We are packaging your product so you can take it out.
invoice.handlingProductsPickup: We are packaging your products so you can take them out.

shipping.onePackagePickup: Your order is available for withdrawal.
shipping.onePackagePickedUp: Your order has been picked up
shipping.manyPackagesDelivery: A new delivery has been started.
shipping.manyPackagesPickup: A new order is available for withdrawal.
shipping.manyPackagesDelivered: One of your packages has been delivered.
shipping.manyPackagesPickedUp: One of your packages has been pickedup.
shipping.manyPackages: Your order has more than one package.
shipping.notifications: We will let you know about the progress of each of them.
shipping.estimateMessage: The order period must be considered only after confirmation of payment.
shipping.deliveryDetails: Here are the details of your delivery:
shipping.pickupProduct: You can already withdraw your product. Please check the instructions:
shipping.pickupProducts: You can already withdraw your products. Please check the instructions:
shipping.pickupOneProduct: You can already withdraw one of your products. Please check the instructions:
shipping.pickupSomeProducts: You may already withdraw some of your products. Please check the instructions:
shipping.pickedUpProduct: Your product has been picked up.
shipping.pickedUpProducts: Your products have been picked up.
shipping.pickedUpOneProduct: One of your products has been picked up.
shipping.pickedUpSomeProducts: Some of your products have been picked up.
shipping.shippingProduct: Your product has just been delivered to the carrier.
shipping.shippingProducts: Your products have just been delivered to the carrier.
shipping.shippingOneProduct: One of the products of your order has just been delivered to the carrier.
shipping.shippingSomeProducts: Some of the products in your order have just been delivered to the carrier.
shipping.deliveredProduct: Your product has just been delivered to your address.
shipping.deliveredProducts: Your products have just been delivered to your address.
shipping.deliveredOneProduct: One of the products of your order has just been delivered to your address.
shipping.deliveredSomeProducts: Some of the products in your order have just been delivered to your address.
